meta.facility_name: Adventist Health System dba Adventist Glen Oaks Hospital

fields.hname: Adventist Health System dba Adventist Glen Oaks Hospital
fields.operator: Adventist Health System dba Adventist Glen Oaks Hospital
fields.plantowner: Adventist Health System dba Adventist Glen Oaks Hospital
fields.odetail: Joint venture with University of Chicago
fields.facility_diversity_comments: While no set goal is associated with capital, AdventHealth strives to increase diversity spending year over year by participating in local and state diversity councils and supporting networking and business educational events.
fields.planned_diversity_expenditures:
AdventHealth is committed to exploring new opportunities with diverse suppliers.  If your company is interested in doing business with AdventHealth, please fill out the Supplier Company Profile form. Information submitted through this process does not guarantee business from AdventHealth with your company.  If an opportunity for your equipment, product, or service is identified, you will be contacted by AdventHealth Strategic Supply Chain to participate when the applicable competitive bid process commences.  

https://www.adventhealth.com/services/adventhealth-business-services/company-profile
fields.plan_for_diversity_recruitment:
AdventHealth Strategic Supply Chain is committed to developing mutually beneficial and successful partnerships with diverse suppliers by incorporating them into our product and service reviews and bid process.  Our Mission: To cultivate business relationships with minority, woman-owned, small businesses, Veteran owned, LGBTBE and local suppliers that positively impact patient care, community relations and social economics in the communities served by AdventHealth.   We encourage suppliers to utilize the following platforms to stay abreast of opportunities to connect with us on current and future opportunities:   Maintaining an up-to-date Company Profile form on an annual basis and through email at

 Supplychain@adventhealth.com.
fields.challenges_to_diversity_recruitment: Our ability to identify diverse suppliers with a flexible business model that supports our scope and size, has proven quality, and ensures we provide our hospitals with the right products at the most competitive price enables us to carry out our mission and fulfill our promise of whole-person care for every patient.
fields.hsfrb_assistance: Encourage suppliers to complete a Company Profile at https://www.adventhealth.com/services/adventhealth-business-services/suppliers
fields.certifications:
AdventHealth recognizes the following diversity classifications:
SBE - Small Business Enterprise
WBE - Women-Owned Business Enterprise
MBE - Minority-Owned Business Enterprise
VBE - Veteran-Owned Business Enterprise
LGBTBE - Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Business Enterprise
fields.point_of_contact: Please see the link below and use the Company Profile form at the bottom to connect with AdventHealth Strategic Supply Chain:  https://www.adventhealth.com/services/adventhealth-business-services/suppliers
fields.enrollment_process: In an effort to streamline the process, please see the link below and use the Company Profile form at the bottom to connect with AdventHealth Strategic Supply Chain:  https://www.adventhealth.com/services/adventhealth-business-services/suppliers
fields.examples_of_successes:
• Fostering relationships with state and local diversity councils.  Cultivate relationships with diverse suppliers through mentoring, consulting services, and educational seminars by partnering with state and local diversity councils. 
• Integrate supplier diversity into corporate goals
• Invest in a tool to manage the performance of your program and establish annual goals
